lines.text: Most beautiful things tend to have a bite to them.
No matter what, thank you for tonight.
I look at myself as an essential ingredient in the art of creation.
Believe me, I have a way of making a man scream.
It's not safe to talk to strangers - it's much safer to kill 'em.
Let's just say I have an entrepreneurial spirit.
Stay away from me, Bob, or I promise I will give you a reason to hate me.
